revised_title: Numerical Elements of Indian Meteorology: Isothermal Lines and Meteorological Observations
tldr: The author presents a study of Indian meteorology, focusing on isothermal lines and temperature data collected from various stations in India and the Indian Archipelago. The study includes a detailed analysis of the data collected by the author and his brothers, as well as original manuscripts of meteorological observations made by other observers under the authority of the Indian Government.
